name: Time Rift (itch)
description:
Battle a handful of bullet-hell inducing crystalline monsters in waves that grow ever more intense as time ticks onward.

Make quick use of a number of weapons including:
-Your trusty laser rifle.
-A sweeping plasma shotgun.
-An explosive energy charged laser grenade launcher.
-An extended range laser cannon.

It might be futile seeing as there is no end to time nor these crystalline monsters but that has never been a problem for our unnamed hero. Having no history or origin and a crippling addiction to time dust, he's a galactic mercenary that's as much of an anomaly in space-time as his foes and naturally that means he's got nothing holding him back.

"It's not personal, it's just our inescapable cosmic destiny." -Our protagonist (probably?)

Credits are located in the game files.

There is sound it just needs to be turned on in the pause menu starts off by default.
